prompt.content: Calculate FTAI aviation's (NASDAQ: FTAI) return on capital during FY 2024. Express the answer as a percentage rounded to two decimal points of precision (ex: X.XX%).

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Define the Return on Capital as ROIC which is equal to NOPAT ÷ average invested capital across the FY fiscal year of '24 ","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Define the formula for NOPAT as EBIT × (1 − effective tax rate)"},{"criteria":"Define EBIT as operating income from the consolidated statement of operations","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Define the calculating method for the effective tax rate as the as provision for income taxes ÷ income before income taxes (Pre-tax Income)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Invested capital defined as total debt (gross, bonds payable) + total equity − cash and cash equivalents","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Average invested capital computed as mean of invested capital at 12/31/2023 and 12/31/2024"},{"criteria":"FY2024 total revenues = 1,734,901 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 total expenses = 1,497,074 (USD thousands)"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 EBIT = 237,827 (USD thousands)"},{"criteria":"FY2024 income before income taxes = 14,169 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 provision for income taxes = 5,487 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FY2024 effective tax rate = 5,487 ÷ 14,169 = 38.73%","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FY2024 NOPAT = 145,727.6 (USD thousands)"},{"criteria":"2024 total debt (gross bonds payable) = 3,496,004 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"2024 total equity = 81,368 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"2024 cash and cash equivalents = 115,116 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Invested capital at 12/31/2024 = 3,462,256 (USD thousands)"},{"criteria":"2023 total debt (gross bonds payable) = 2,550,493 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"2023 total equity = 175,883 (USD thousands)"},{"criteria":"2023 cash and cash equivalents = 90,756 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Invested capital at 12/31/2023 = 2,635,620 (USD thousands)"},{"criteria":"Average invested capital = (3,462,256 + 2,635,620) ÷ 2 = 3,048,938 (USD thousands)","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Return on capital (ROC) for FY2024 = 145,727.6 ÷ 3,048,938 = 4.78%","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Final answer rounded to two decimal points of precision","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Final answer is expressed as a percentage"}]
